column4: Dec. 27 – The US Embassy Phnom Penh announced Thursday that it will suspend activities on Facebook page due to the lapse in appropriations.------“Due to the lapse in appropriations
column5: this account will not be updated regularly. We will not update this account until full operations resume
column6: with the exception of urgent safety and security information
column7: ” according to the Embassy’s Facebook.------“All scheduled passport and visas services at U.S. Embassy Phnom Penh will continue. For information on our services and operating status
